wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Of course, you could do what I do with my combination of my Mac, TiVo, and the AirPort Express. Music and images float magically through the air from computer to TVs and to stereo. No programming involved. TV can go from my family room TiVo to my bedroom TiVO, and soon down to my laptop to take with me. Just an alternate point of view, of course.
